original_text:
though you make them grow on the day that you plant them,
    and make them blossom in the morning that you sow,
yet the harvest will flee away
    in a day of grief and incurable pain.
korean_text: 네가 심는 날에 울타리를 두르고 아침에 네 씨가 잘 발육하도록 하였으나 근심과 심한 슬픔의 날에 농작물이 없어지리라

sentences.original_text: though you make them grow on the day that you plant them,
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 그들을 심는 날에 자라게 하더라도,

sentences.original_text: and make them blossom in the morning that you sow,
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 씨를 뿌리는 아침에 꽃이 피게 하더라도,

sentences.original_text: yet the harvest will flee away
in a day of grief and incurable pain.
